title: Emmy awards, VMAs and the return of TFI Friday â plus the rest of today's breaking pop culture news | Culture | The Guardian
summary: cute is what we aim for .

documents.title: stuff to do tonight
text: if you 're in manchester , go and see japanese psych sensei acid mothers temple at the ruby lounge .
if you 're in brighton , go and see rowdy flower-punks black lips at concorde 2 .
if you 're in edinburgh , take a break from the comedy with screening of miles & war , a fascinating-looking documentary about conflict mediators , at the edinburgh filmhouse .
it 's followed by a q & a with the director and one of her subjects .
if you 're stuck at home , the telly offers indonesian pilots , russian princesses , sex masters and everyday miracles .
of course , if you 've got tickets to kate bush , then i remain eternally jealous .
especially if she plays this : pure chills , despite the clammy wogan intro .
that 's all from me , gwilym and lanre will be keeping you diverted tomorrow .
do join them .
byee .

documents.title: cute is what we aim for
text: thanks to numbers affiliate sophie and the mysterious pc music clan , overbearingly cute k- and j-pop-influenced dance music is having a bit of an internet-hipster moment .
now sophie and pc music boss ag cook have pooled their resources for hey qt , an infuriatingly catchy number that comes across like daphne & celeste in the happy hardcore tent .
massive earworm !
if however , you 'd like to hear some music from actual teenage girls , rather than grown men pretending to be teenage girls , here 's the new single from brazilian baile funk trio pearl negras .

documents.title: holy emoji
text: over at wired they 've been having fun with emojis , creating emoji-bios for some of our favourite tv and movie characters .
here 's what walter white 's story looks like reduced to a series of smiley phone symbols .
guess there 's not a handy emoji for looking on guiltily while your partner 's girlfriend chokes on her own vomit , but otherwise not bad the pollos are a nice touch .
similarly , this cersei lannister emoji-bio is lacking a handy incest symbol but apart from that it 's got her licked .
see if you can guess the rest here .

documents.title: twerk-free zone
text: sick of mainstream pop videos which only seem to consist of annoyingly good-looking people parachuted into a gritty location and/or twerking ?
well , here are three rather artier promo vids , showing what you can do when budget is limited but imagination is not .
london technopop chap ghost culture appears to be rushing to catch a gig staged in the large intestine of a giant plasticine human .
electro-shoegaze types bear in heaven , meanwhile , are trapped in an old pc adventure game where they have n't finished building all the levels .
finally , tenebrous indie-gloom trio esben & the witch have been pranked by mischievous yokels who keep telling them there 's a pub just over that hill¦

documents.title: temples of boom
text: sun structures , the recent album from kettering psychedelic dreamers temples , was a throughly agreeable listen but lacking somewhat in bite and personality .
however , that made it ripe for the remixing ; beyond the wizard 's sleeve ( aka erol alkan and richard norris ) have taken up the challenge , giving the whole album a cosmic disco overhaul .
sun restructured is out in november , and this is the first somnambulant taster .

documents.title: smooth operators
text: time for a smooth r & b interlude .
first up , here 's diva-in-waiting tinashe with her nicely understated new single pretend , featuring a $ ap rocky .
and following his fret-frotting performance at the vmas , usher has snuck out a new mike will made it-produced track called believe me .
usher and nicki at the vmas : everybody needs a bottom for a pillow .
mccarten/rex

documents.title: that friday feeling
text: so apparently chris evans has been approached by channel 4 to revive zany 90s chatshow tfi friday , initially for a one-off 20th anniversary edition but potentially for a whole new series .
understandably , evans is bang up for it but whether or not the viewing public share his enthusiasm is open to question .

of course , it 's fashionable to dismiss the show now as the nadir of boorish britpop bullying , responsible for prolonging the careers of reef and ocean colour scene , but if you were over the age of 13 in 1996 i 'll bet you tuned in every week .
not sure how many of it 's regular features would sneak past the pc police in the ofcom-fearing 2000s , however .
on the other hand , i 'd happily watch more episodes of shaun 's shop .

documents.title: pointless awards roundup part 2 : the emmys
text: the emmys are a notoriously dull ceremony , prone to handing out gongs to comedies that most people stopped watching years ago , like the big bang theory and modern family .
you can read some more respected guardian journalists arguing about who should have won what here and here .

otherwise , all you need to know from last night 's love-in is that bryan cranston snogged julia louis-dreyfus¦ ¦gwen stefani mispronounced the colbert report¦ ¦and sofia vergara was paraded as some kind of human trophy to distract leering men from the boring bits , like on a 70s gameshow .
turns out beyoncã© 's sloganeering was all for nothing .

documents.title: pointless awards roundup part 1 : the vmas
text: in case you have too much of a life to check your twitter feed over a bank holiday weekend , here 's what happened at sunday 's mtv vma awards .

having caused a moral panic at last year 's ceremony by foam-fingering herself in the vicinity of robin thicke 's crotch , miley cyrus chose to reveal her social conscience by sending up a ( sus handsome ) homeless teen to collect her award , to raise awareness for a homeless centre in la .
although miley could n't resist mugging tearfully at the lip of stage , just to let you know how much she cares .
sticking with the serious tone , common made a speech about ferguson¦ ¦and beyoncã© performed in front of ten-foot letters spelling out the word feminist .
beyoncã© at the vmas .
buckner/getty images in this climate of worthiness , nicki minaj 's bottom-heavy performance of anaconda could n't help but look a bit crass .
maybe she should have scrawled a message of support to striking fast-food workers across her arse-cheeks .

documents.title: real estate of mind
text: carnival airhorns stashed away for another year , it 's back to the business of providing faintly droll commentary on various pop-cultural goings-on .

but before we get stuck into the latest round of celebrity backslapping , here 's the reliably jangly real estate covering paper dolls by proto-punkers the nerves for the b-side of their new 7 ( out today on domino ) .

bulletin.text: Oompah, oompah, stick it up your jumper it's the Guide Daily!
Music, film and TV gossip, updated throughout the day as if it were somehow important.
Today: pointless statuettes, cosmic rock and the world's second-most famous Chris Evans.
Be a part of it all by tweeting @twitterid or commenting below.
